title: d(*_*)b  New Team Looking For Memebers
body:
Hi All,

As the title say new team and looking for MAIN Role: Jungle, Top, Mid
I am MAIN Support and I have a ADC (we both are from NZ)

The team’s focus will be learning from one another and improving our team play as whole.
Will be doing lots of normals upskilling and gearing towards Season 8 5v5 Flex.

Requirements:
- Able to play 4 days a week with the team (Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday 8:30PM NZT Start. We will be playing minimum of 3 games per night)
- Use discord (if you don’t have it takes like 2 minutes to install and easy to use)

If you would like to join {{summoner:31}} , drop me a message here or add me IGN: Oriphix  {{item:2009}} 

Please note that we will be going through a selection process (we are not looking only for skills!) {{summoner:13}} 

twitch.tv/oriphix

Thanks 
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body: Hey there add me Ruthlessbogan on LOL im a 600k xp tf main im very coodinated and I like to gank for bot im currently silver 2.
Hi there, will add you tonight and we can discuss further :)
